titles.title: Congratulating Prime Minister Portia Simpson-Miller for becoming the first democratically-elected female Prime Minister of Jamaica and the first female head of state.
Congratulating Prime Minister Portia Simpson-Miller for becoming the first democratically-elected female Prime Minister of Jamaica and the first female head of state.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary:
Congratulates Prime Minister Portia Simpson-Miller for becoming the first democratically-elected female Prime Minister of Jamaica and the first female Jamaican head of state.
Commends the people of Jamaica for this benchmark for women, for democracy, and for a diverse and prosperous nation, and encourages further political and leadership progress by Jamaican women.
